mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY ( REPLY_NO, REF_BNO, REPLY_WRITER, REPLY_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{replyNo}, #{refBno}, #{replyWriter}, #{replyContent} )
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO replyNo, M.NICKNAME nickName, REPLY_CONTENT replyContent, TO_CHAR(R.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as createDate FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = B.BOARD_WRITER) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND REF_BNO = #{refBno} ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
